trans-unit.source: Specifies the formats that an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> will accept from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os formatos que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> aceitará da área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.PreferredPasteFormats%2A> to make the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> accept [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.PreferredPasteFormats%2A> para tornar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> aceitar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] formato, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> accepts Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> aceita formato ISF.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> accepts "Extensible Application Markup Language" (XAML) format.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> aceita o formato XAML (Extensible Application Markup Language).
